description:
Umibozu turns out to have a soft spot, as he`s been using an assumed name to send money to the daughter of his deceased friend from their mercenary days, but now she wants to meet him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ryo & Umibozu`s Sweet Daddy Longlegs Story: Part One
Ryou to Umibouzu no Junjou Ashinaga Ojisan Densetsu (Zenpen)
獠と海坊主の純情足ながおじさん伝説 (前編)
